title: Did Post Malone Reply To Mike D’s Twitter Message? + Lunchbox Was ATTACKED! + Show Member Reveals They Once Auditioned For American Idol
itunes:title: Did Post Malone Reply To Mike D’s Twitter Message? + Lunchbox Was ATTACKED! + Show Member Reveals They Once Auditioned For American Idol
description:
Bobby wanted to get Post Malone on the show after seeing him perform a Brad Paisley cover this week. Post Malone happens to follow Mike D on Twitter so he messaged him and asked him to come on the show. We found out his response. Lunchbox was attacked by an animal and lives to tell the tale. We found out someone from the show one audition for American Idol so we challenged them to recreate the audition! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
